A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film had it's flaws for sure but I'd be lying if I said I didn't have a blast watching it! Finn's arc felt a bit shoehorned and random and some of the reveals felt a bit lackluster\, but some\, I feel\, are acting as set up for episode 9\, and if I'm wrong\, I still thoroughly enjoyed the direction they took the franchise and I had a blast!
